data.text:
@kendrafeliciter @thehowie @ZekeEmanuel @michaelmina_lab @JenniferNuzzo @hmkyale @VirusesImmunity @YaleMed @YaleSOM @YaleSPH Let’s discuss ideas and facts. 
Please read the report and find even the sentence with which you disagree.

@thehowie @ZekeEmanuel @RPEddy @michaelmina_lab @JenniferNuzzo @hmkyale @VirusesImmunity @YaleMed @YaleSOM @YaleSPH Concerning though that already the White House is behind on its paxlovid purchasing - lots of positive WH messaging without on the ground capability and your plan has many elements they sadly ignore

@thehowie @ZekeEmanuel @RPEddy @michaelmina_lab @JenniferNuzzo @hmkyale @VirusesImmunity @YaleMed @YaleSOM @YaleSPH That plan shows a complete misunderstanding of where America is today psychologically.

This isn’t about COVID, it’s about politics. Dems will wear masks and live in fear of COVID to signal tribal membership and Reps will do the opposite. This will happen forever.
